title: Phil Manzanera - Diamond Head-Vinylrip-Abrasax
description:
Phil Manzanera-Diamond Head-Vinylrip-Abrasax

Vinylrip:
Phil Manzanera-Diamond Head
RELEASED 1975
LABEL: Island
FORMAT: LP
PRODUCER: Phil Manzanera
BITRATE: 320

A-side:
01. Frontera "vocal by Robert Wyatt"
02. Diamond Head
03. Big Day "vocal by Brian Eno"
04. The Flex
05. Same Time Next Week "vocals by John Wetton and Doreen Chanter"

B-side:
06. Miss Shapiro "vocal by Brian Eno"
07. East of Echo
08. Lagrima
09. Alma "vocal by Bill McCormick"


Diamond Head was the first solo album by Phil Manzanera, issued in 1975. It was originally issued in the UK on Island (who was handling all E.G. recordings) and in US on Atco. The sound quality on the US album left a lot to be desired, so the UK import was a popular seller in the speciality record shops who sold Roxy Music and other UK bands.


Robert Wyatt - vocals, timbales, cabasa, background vocals 
Brian Eno - vocals, rhythm guitar,, piano, percusssion 
Eddie Jobson - strings, fender piano, electric clavinet 
Andy Mackay - sorprano and alto sax 
John Wetton - bass, vocals, mellotron 
Paul Thompson - drums
